title: Bug 7785: SaveAs Forgets the file type
description: Bug 7785: SaveAs Forgets the file type. The icon has also changed from the parent java file icon to a generic file icon.
OB:
1) Open an existing java file.
2) Modify it (e.g., move an existing class).
3) Click the SaveAs icon, located next to the Save Icon.
4) A dialog will appear.
5) Browse for a valid container location.
6) Enter the filename, but exclude the extension, as it is not requested.
7) Click OK.

Observed Behavior: The Navigator adds the file in the specified location, but no file extension is shown for the saved file.
EB:
The file is now treated as a generic file, as opening it will show the file content as text.

Expected Behavior: The file should be saved with the same extension as the original file unless explicitly changed.
